p: In the present study, we observed YFV-positive carcasses collected in urban areas boundaries and different neighborhoods, including downtown areas or near to the central area of different cities. For example, 25-YFV positive marmosets were collected in urban areas of Belo Horizonte (2.5 million inhabitants), the state capital, and a total of 76 YFV-positive marmosets were sampled in the Metropolitan Region of Minas Gerais state (5.0 million inhabitants). Due to some carcasses location (for example, near the downtown area of Belo Horizonte), the land use, and marmosets territorial behavior [ 32], some of these NHP would have been likely infected in urban matrixes.
